title: Spanakopita (Greek spinach pie)
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1kg spinach, rinsed and chopped', '30g chopped fresh parsley', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '125g ricotta cheese', '250g crumbled feta cheese', '8 sheets filo pastry', '4 tablespoons olive oil']
